lyrics:
8 contributorsmy moment intro lyricsintro
i aint gonna use the beat this time ima get ima get a little more intimate with em
you ready

bridge
ooh ooh ooh
ooh ooh ooh
ooh ooh ooh
ooh ooh ooh

chorus
this is my moment this is my moment
this what i wanted this what i wanted
you know that im with it you fuck with me im goin
when that money callin i throw a bitch off me im on it
im on it nigga

verse 1
i sat there and waited for niggas to help me
all that talkin they did them niggas aint show it
i sat there and starved i remember the hunger ah
ayy when i got a plate bitch it was over
game over
nigga back the fuck off me fore them killers get on you ooh
i aint gotta be steamin for these bitches to blow me ooh
beat my case in kentucky but they wanted to stone me ooh
one time for my bitch i won me a trophy ooh
neil mama know that her son safe
cause at all times im ridin with him
deangelo ever get killed i cant tell the story cause im dyin with him
i was just broke without a dime with him
and cody countin piles with him
matchin aps its our time nigga
feel good to be alive nigga
i know niggas niggas cool
fuck em ill kill anyone
but my niggas aint gettin touched
if they ever call me im whippin up
hoppin out and im liftin up
fifty shots on that glizzy drum
niggas coppin pleas i aint hearin em
obituaries gettin printed up
aint no beef with you niggas
you niggas can blow me ooh
fifty racks on me thats after the rollie ooh
i wasnt comin home oh thats what they told you
i aint kill nobody bitch you know they couldnt hold me ooh
one time for my codefendants
nigga everybody stayed solid
ayy theo we goin to the grave
in assessment nigga we was wildin
ayy dwan though when they split us up my blood felt like lava
point out them niggas that shot you
so i can set them niggas on fire
ayy big t if you can hear me dawg
i cant breathe without you im drownin
when suge called with them bad news
all them tears had a nigga blinded
ayy mom dukes when you fought the feds
i just knew that you was gon beat em
when they gave you all of that time
it aint hurt cause i couldnt believe it
you might also likechorus
but look this is my moment and this what i wanted
before you fuck with me just know that im with it
with whoever im goin
real niggas gon listen cause im a real nigga
cant nobody clone me
you fuck with my niggas im comin to get you
i swear that im on it ooh

verse 2
ten bands for a feature
five hundred to answer my phone for you
i aint got room for no leechers
mufuckers only call when they want somethin
niggas really out here snitchin
still runnin round like they aint told nothin
real talk im scared of yall niggas
yallll get a nigga super bowl numbers
dont do it just for the money
you aint gon always get rewarded
when you one hundred dont nothin come with it
and when youre real you dont get nothin for it
long as them circles stay silent and loyal
what else is really important
watch me do this shit for all of my niggas
watch me get this money tellin my story
chorus
nigga this is my moment this is my moment
this what i wanted this what i wanted
you know that im with it you fuck with me im goin
when that money callin ill throw a bitch off me im on it
im on it nigga like ooh ooh ooh

ooh ooh oohembed
